column4: hey guys I was playing with screensavers and when clicking on them one of the locked up my computer now that screensaver is set to come on in 2 mins and I can't change it because as soon as I open the screensaver app system locks up
how can I change this from command line
have you installed your graphics drivers?
what graphics card do you have?
ok so your saying the screensaver locks up your computer everytime it runs?
does running glxgears lock up your computer?
BTW: save all your work first...
just in case
weird... i have no idea... sorry
actually
how does it lock up. etc. can you move your mouse?
uh
when it locks up try and hit Alt+SysRq+R and then Alt+SysRq+K see if that does anything
i dunno
wants to disable his
wait
open gconf-editor
yes but
Alt+F2 then type gconf-editor
then goto apps/gnome-screensaver
in the tree
then tell me whats in the list on the right
